**Fridge-to-Table**: A smart fridge that includes a built-in cooking surface and a set of automated cooking utensils. The system can be programmed to cook meals to your specifications and can also be controlled remotely using a smartphone app. It includes a touchscreen display and a set of sensors to track temperature, humidity, and cooking time.

**Fridge Memory**: A smart fridge that uses advanced AI and machine learning to learn your eating habits and preferences over time. It can suggest recipes based on your dietary needs and preferences and can also order groceries online and have them delivered to your doorstep.
